name: poo-cardapio-electron
description: Aplicativo Electron para receber notificações de novos pedidos

scripts.dev: npm run build:renderer && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && mkdir -p dist/renderer dist/config && cp src/renderer/index.html src/renderer/styles.css dist/renderer/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/config/config.json dist/config/ 2>/dev/null || cp src/config/config.example.json dist/config/config.json 2>/dev/null || true && electron dist/main.js
scripts.build: npm run build:renderer && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && electron-builder
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:renderer && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && electron-builder --mac
